author: franzoni
body:
3 HI workflows with 13 TeV pp GEN-SIM; for HI validation while himixing unavailable
- used physics channels proposed by @BetterWang https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5797
- assuring Acla consistency across all the steps
- migrating from 8 to 13 TeV, as agreed with @kkrajczar
title: 3 HI workflows with 13 TeV pp GEN-SIM
